description: An accidental discovery of his boyfriend’s phone, Theo Ford cannot help but let his curiosity take over and take a look at what his boyfriend has been up to. He soon regrets checking the phone when he discovers that his boyfriend has been cheating on him. Luckily for Theo, Jessy Ares is there to express sympathy, but he is also there to offer Theo the chance to get revenge on his philandering boyfriend. With an empty gym providing privacy for the hook up, both men decide to take advantage and fuck around.
title: Here And Now
